info.label: Full Stack Engineer
info.brief: Over six years experience building for the web & mobile.

skills.name: Lead developer for Klue's Salesforce integrations.
Lead developer for Cash Live's dashboard and CMS.
Expert at building stable, adaptive, scalable UIs.
Proficient with the command line and linux/unix environments.
Generalist mentality. Enjoy working the whole stack.

history.summary: Cash Live is a free, daily, real-time poker game anyone can play.
highlights: Worked as part of a small team of fully remote developers.
Built a real-time GRPC dashboard for the game server with React (next.js).
Built a fully-featured companion CMS with React (next.js).
Early stage role. Floated around the stack.

history.summary: Empathy Games for High School Kids. launched out of StartED Incubator at NYU.
highlights: Lead a small, remote team of developers.
Built multiple game servers and web / mobile / universal game clients.
Database modeling backed by MongoDB and DynamoDB.
Inception role. Contributed to product design and brand positioning.

history.summary: Klue is competitive business intelligence for sales professionals.
highlights: Built an embedded Salesforce application that interfaced with the Klue API.
Built a Salesforce authentication proxy server using node.js.
Built various client-facing product features, including initial product onboarding.
Lead the transition from the Browserify to Webpack, E2E testing with Cypress
Keen contributor to documentation and knowledge shares.

history.summary: Creative web design and development for an advertising/digital agency.
highlights: Built various high performance web apps and static (landing) pages using React.
Built a couple low-level React animation tools, that were eventually open-sourced.
iOS app development experience with React Native.

history.summary: Search engine optimization and content marketing for the gaming industry.
highlights: Primary copywriter on email marketing campaigns netting millions in revenue.
Heavy emphasis on technical ability and knowledge of web technology (hacks).
Proven and repeatable search engine optimization success for valuable keywords.
Conversion rate optimization for landing pages receiving 30k+ monthly visits.
Solo designed and built many websites.

history.summary: Copywriter and digital marketer with a focus on international audiences.
highlights: Prolific blogger and content marketing strategist.
Web development for teachaway.com and satellite properties.
Landing page conversion rate optimization and search engine optimization.
Responsible for rapid growth on Facebook by utilizing 'content gates'.

history.summary: Copywriter in a technical role, helping to build out the emails and webpages.
highlights: Lead copywriting for blogs, long form content, and press releases.
Basic web development for website, blog, and HTML newsletters/emails.
Proven sucess with search engine marketing and optimization campaigns.

history.summary: Digital Literacy for Women and Youth. Teaching coding and web technology.
